00026 #include "OgreBone.h"
00027 #include "OgreSkeleton.h"
00028 
00029 
00030 namespace Ogre {
00031 
00032     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00033     Bone::Bone(unsigned short handle, Skeleton* creator) 
00034         : Node(), mCreator(creator), mHandle(handle)
00035     {
00036     }
00037     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00038     Bone::Bone(const String& name, unsigned short handle, Skeleton* creator) 
00039         : Node(name), mCreator(creator), mHandle(handle)
00040     {
00041     }
00042     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00043     Bone::~Bone()
00044     {
00045     }
00046     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00047     Bone* Bone::createChild(const Vector3& translate, const Quaternion& rotate)
00048     {
00049         // Provided as a passthrough to superclass just for ease
00050         return static_cast<Bone*>(Node::createChild(translate, rotate));
00051     }
00052     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00053     Bone* Bone::createChild(unsigned short handle, const Vector3& translate, 
00054         const Quaternion& rotate)
00055     {
00056         Bone* retBone = mCreator->createBone(handle);
00057         retBone->translate(translate);
00058         retBone->rotate(rotate);
00059         this->addChild(retBone);
00060         return retBone;
00061     }
00062     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00063     Bone* Bone::createChild(const String& name, const Vector3& translate, 
00064         const Quaternion& rotate)
00065     {
00066         Bone* retBone = mCreator->createBone(name);
00067         retBone->translate(translate);
00068         retBone->rotate(rotate);
00069         this->addChild(retBone);
00070         return retBone;
00071     }
00072     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00073     Bone* Bone::getChild(unsigned short index) const
00074     {
00075         // Provided as a passthrough to superclass just for ease
00076         return static_cast<Bone*>(Node::getChild(index));
00077     }
00078     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00079     Bone* Bone::removeChild(unsigned short index)
00080     {
00081         // Provided as a passthrough to superclass just for ease
00082         return static_cast<Bone*>(Node::removeChild(index));
00083     }
00084     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00085     Node* Bone::createChildImpl(void)
00086     {
00087         return mCreator->createBone();
00088     }
00089     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00090     Node* Bone::createChildImpl(const String& name)
00091     {
00092         return mCreator->createBone(name);
00093     }
00094     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00095     void Bone::setBindingPose(void)
00096     {
00097         
00098         // Bake the current status into the binding pose
00099         mBindOrientation = mOrientation;
00100         mBindPosition = mPosition;
00101 
00102         // Save inverse derived, used for mesh transform later (assumes _update() has been called by Skeleton)
00103         makeTransform(_getDerivedPosition(), Vector3::UNIT_SCALE , 
00104             _getDerivedOrientation(), mBindDerivedInverseTransform);
00105         // Invert, no scale so transpose is inverse
00106         mBindDerivedInverseTransform = mBindDerivedInverseTransform.transpose();
00107     }
00108     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00109     void Bone::reset(void)
00110     {
00111         // Restore from binding pose
00112         mOrientation = mBindOrientation;
00113         mPosition = mBindPosition;
00114     }
00115     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00116     Matrix4 Bone::_getBindingPoseInverseTransform(void)
00117     {
00118         return mBindDerivedInverseTransform;
00119     }
00120     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00121     unsigned short Bone::getHandle(void) const
00122     {
00123         return mHandle;
00124     }
